channel.title: Cant load any server
channel.description:
pretty much every server or source that i download has this code in its run file. and when i click on the run it opens then closes right away. and when i try to run it i get an error saying java is not an internal or external command but i already set my environmentals.
[code]java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
What do i have to do to my computer in order to run servers with that code in the run file.

item.title: Cant load any server
item.dc:creator: @messer186 messer186
item.description:
@messer186 wrote:

I Think Your Problem is JDK (Java Devlopment Kit)

http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp <== download from their.

Hope I Helped.

Read full topic
